help.title: How to Use
help.content:
This tool helps you calculate card fusion probabilities and manage your card collection. The results are calculated based on the official GrandChase item rate table.

  • Select cards: Click the checkboxes to select cards you have
  • Sort columns: Click on Point, Group, or No. headers to sort
  • View summary: The top panel shows recommended point ranges for fusion
  • Invert: Invert your current selection
  • Filter Groups: '{uncollectible}' label is for cards that don't belong to card collections. '{exclusive}' label is for cards that cannot be obtained through fusion.

Your selections are automatically saved and will persist on your next visit.
